title: Strengthening Reading Comprehension Skills with Easy-Reading Strategies Based on UDL

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Reading Skills and Understanding of Sentence Structure
context.additional_context: A customized reading education program conducted in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment. Emphasizes practical reading skills through job-related document/announcement analysis for job seekers.

learning_goals: Learners extract key information from various text genres (job documents, announcements, academic materials) with 80% accuracy
Learners can apply three or more easy-reading strategies based on UDL principles (e.g., using visual cues, restructuring text) appropriately to different contexts.
Learners can improve their text comprehension by over 70% using the 5-step questioning method (who/what/why/how/so what) after reading.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
